verses.name: John 18:21
verses.text: Why askest thou me? ask them which heard me, what I have said unto them: behold, they know what I said.

verses.name: John 18:22
verses.text: And when he had thus spoken, one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand, saying, Answerest thou the high priest so?

verses.name: John 18:23
verses.text: Jesus answered him, If I have spoken evil, bear witness of the evil: but if well, why smitest thou me?

verses.name: John 18:24
verses.text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest.
